function NPC_109123:Init( NPCID ) NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 1 ) end
function NPC109123_BreakParts( ThisNPC, Enemy ) if math.random( 1, 2 ) == 1 then ThisNPC:BreakPart( 1, Enemy) end end
function NPC_109123:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) local HPPer = this:GetHP() / this:GetMaxHP() local State = this:GetUserData( 1 )
if HPPer < 0.5 and State < 1 and ChkMFForHitReaction(HitInfo) then
NPC109123_BreakParts( this, HitInfo.Attacker ) this:SetUserData( 1, 1 ) end end
function NPC_109123:KickAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy )
if Dist < 200 and Enemy:IsRear( ThisNPC ) then -- 근접해서 뒤에있을경우 뒷발길질 ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( 210912306 ) else ThisNPC:MoveToActor( Enemy, 210912305 ) ThisNPC:UseTalent( 210912305, Enemy ) end end
